ygData.subject: Re: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At least on our server, the GM s have told us that using that way in to do a Vox raid would be considered an exploit. They do have a huge agro range too.
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...> wrote:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>

> We were testing the waters for a future Vox raid. Killed
> a lot of giants and spiders, didnt pull any bears or the Magi.
>
> However, I found a little secret entrance I had never seen before
> which leads from the throne room straight to Vox's lair. Only
> a bard with levitate can make it up there. (since our levitate
> continues to make you rise up) - then I proceeded to die as
> several ice giants agro'd on me out of my visual range. (pretty
> far radius, maybe too far)

At least on our server, the GM's have told us that using that way in to
do a Vox raid would be considered an exploit. They do have a huge agro
range too. On our server, we've managed Nagafen, but Vox kicked our
butts.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
